topics.body:
Jeez what the fuckery do is going on with everyone at work.

Some woman's (who works for us) husband is abusive or something, so she's ignoring all his calls attempts to talk to her etc., then he shows up at my office and asks me where the fuck she is and i (with the smuggest face i have ever pulled) say that it's her day off, and i don't know where she is. And NOW he's gone and threatened another one of the women that works with us saying he will tell the police that she is working without a permit (not true) if she doesn't get him in contact with his wife.

"What. WHAT THE FUCK?":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXzEcwYs8Eo
topics.author: 5307a92d6368722c6c0d0100

*Behold, the closest image of Pluto to date!*
!https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4f/NH-Pluto-color-NewHorizons-20150714.png!
Nine and a half years of waiting for this day to come. Time well spent.
